SELECT TO_DATE(ORDER_DATE, 'YYYY-MM') ORDER_DATE ,SUM(TOTAL_PRICE) TOTAL FROM (SELECT OU.ORDER_NUM ,TO_CHAR(OU.ORDER_DATE, 'YYYY-MM') ORDER_DATE ,OUD.TOTAL_PRICE FROM BM_ORDER_USER OU LEFT JOIN BM_ORDER_DETAIL_USER OUD ON OU.ORDER_NUM = OUD.ORDER_NUM UNION ALL SELECT ONU.ORDER_NUM ,TO_CHAR(ONU.ORDER_DATE, 'YYYY-MM') ORDER_DATE ,ONUD.TOTAL_PRICE FROM BM_ORDER_NON_USER ONU LEFT JOIN BM_ORDER_DETAIL_NON_USER ONUD ON ONU.ORDER_NUM = ONUD.ORDER_NUM ) R
WHERE ORDER_DATE BETWEEN TO_CHAR(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'YYYY'), 'YYYY-MM') AND TO_CHAR(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'YYYY')+364, 'YYYY-MM') GROUP BY ROLLUP(ORDER_DATE)

SELECT ORDER_DATE ,SUM(TOTAL_PRICE) TOTAL FROM (SELECT OU.ORDER_NUM ,TO_CHAR(OU.ORDER_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ORDER_DATE ,OUD.TOTAL_PRICE FROM BM_ORDER_USER OU LEFT JOIN BM_ORDER_DETAIL_USER OUD ON OU.ORDER_NUM = OUD.ORDER_NUM UNION ALL SELECT ONU.ORDER_NUM ,TO_CHAR(ONU.ORDER_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ORDER_DATE ,ONUD.TOTAL_PRICE FROM BM_ORDER_NON_USER ONU LEFT JOIN BM_ORDER_DETAIL_NON_USER ONUD ON ONU.ORDER_NUM = ONUD.ORDER_NUM ) WHERE
ORDER_DATE BETWEEN TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM') AND LAST_DAY(SYSDATE)
ORDER_DATE BETWEEN TRUNC(TO_DATE('${month}-1'), 'MM') AND LAST_DAY('${month}-1')
ORDER_DATE BETWEEN TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'IW') AND TRUNC(SYSDATE+7, 'IW')-1
GROUP BY ROLLUP(ORDER_DATE) ORDER BY ORDER_DATE
